title: lf diamond + players for ranked teams
body: if you are diamond and good at one specific role add me xXxQuickScopexXx :)

replies.body:
Hi there Quickscope! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
